0132B4FD.Phase53Description: The scholar Mordarin tells of a Forgotten Codex in the Lost Archives. I should find it and unlock its secrets.

13BA663E.Phase45Description: I should check on Mordarin, he may be injured.

8784047D.Phase17Description: Mordarin has invited me to participate in a ritual to learn more about the Codex.

C9FCD1EA.Phase5Description: My intuition tells me that this man is the source of the astral voice I've been hearing, but I don't know him.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: I feel something, a voice on the astral wind, calling out dimly, somewhere in the mountains. Is this call meant for me?

F4A9EC5A.Phase14Description: I have the Forgotten Codex. I should return to Mordarin, he may be able to help me make sense of it.
